course.title: Ancient Greek Sanctuaries: Mysteries of Initiation
course.description: Using three renowned sanctuaries at - Brauron, Eleusis, and Samothrace - as foci, this course will consider the role of initiation in ancient Greece in the wider context of mystery cults. We will attend to the archaeological and literary evidence as well as to relevant secondary scholarship.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3110.
